ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except for Your chosen slaves among them.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Other than the chosen ones among Your creatures."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except those of Your servants, the chosen ones from amongst them.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except Your sincere servants among them".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except Your true servants amongst them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except Thy servants from among them, the purified ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: excepting those Thy servants among them that are sincere.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save Thy single-minded slaves among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: except for those among them who are Your chosen servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save Thy bondmen among them Sincere.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except Your exclusive servants among them.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except Thy Servants amongst them, sincere and purified (by Thy Grace)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except Your chosen slaves amongst them (faithful, obedient, true believers of Islamic Monotheism)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except those among them who are Your sincere worshipers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except for your loyal servants among them.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:83] except those servants of Yours among them who will be saved’, namely, the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save Thy single minded slaves) save those slaves who are protected from me (among them) among the children of Adam.
